com.mesosphere.sdk.offer

Interface OfferRecommendation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CreateOfferRecommendation, DestroyOfferRecommendation, LaunchOfferRecommendation, ReserveOfferRecommendation, UnreserveOfferRecommendation

    public interface OfferRecommendation
    This interface encapsulates both a recommended Mesos Operation to be performed and an Offer on which the Operation should be performed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Offer getOffer()
      Returns the Offer upon which the Operation returned by getOperation() should be performed.
      Operation getOperation()
      Returns the operation which should be performed in regards to the specified Offer returned by getOffer().

    • Method Detail

      • getOperation

        Operation getOperation()
        Returns the operation which should be performed in regards to the specified Offer returned by getOffer().

      • getOffer

        Offer getOffer()
        Returns the Offer upon which the Operation returned by getOperation() should be performed.
